Title: Neltharus: Secrets Within
Description:
We have a problem, traveler. The djaradin first emerged from within Neltharus, which means they must be ransacking the halls! 

Neltharus contains many treasures. But more importantly, it contains knowledge: the history of our flight and its fall from grace. Both Sabellian and Wrathion have been looking for more information regarding Neltharion's life and work.

Go! See what you can recover before the djaradin plunder it all!
ObjectivesText: Recover from Neltharus 12 Neltharion's Notes, 3 Obsidian Journals, and a Research Tome.
RewardText: These items are wonderful! There is a trove of information here to study!
